name: First Trimester Sister Circle
description: A welcoming group for Black women newly pregnant — share your story, connect over early symptoms, and find sisterhood from day one.

name: Mind & Body Reset (Trimester 1)
description: Weekly reflections and affirmations for grounding yourself during early pregnancy. Led by a licensed Black therapist.

name: Ask a Midwife (First Trimester)
description: Live Q&A sessions with Black midwives covering early pregnancy myths, spotting, and safe prenatal habits.

name: Faith & Fertility Circle
description: Faith-based affirmations and prayer support for Black women navigating early pregnancy uncertainty.

name: Morning Wellness Lounge
description: Daily tips and chat for handling nausea, fatigue, and building gentle morning routines.

name: First Trimester Nutrition & Nausea
description: Sharing culturally familiar meal ideas to ease morning sickness and nourish your baby.

name: Newly Pregnant in Boston
description: For Boston-based Black moms-to-be to find nearby OB/GYNs, midwives, and community events.

name: Body Changes & Confidence Chat
description: Discuss early body changes, identity, and self-love in a supportive, Black-centered space.

name: Family Planning & Sharing the News
description: Supportive talk about announcing pregnancy to loved ones and setting early boundaries.

name: First Trimester Fitness Flow
description: Gentle yoga and stretching routines tailored for early pregnancy and Black women’s health needs.

name: Glow & Grow (Trimester 2)
description: Celebrate milestones — baby movements, anatomy scans, and bump updates — with other radiant Black moms.

name: Black Maternal Health Advocates
description: Learn about your rights, health equity, and how to advocate for yourself in the healthcare system.

name: Partner Support Space (Trimester 2)
description: Conversations for couples and co-parents on nesting, communication, and preparing together.

name: Nutrition & Wellness Chat (Trimester 2)
description: Sharing iron-rich recipes, hydration reminders, and culturally inspired meals.

name: Movement & Stretch Lounge
description: Moderate prenatal exercise routines and mobility tips for a healthy, active pregnancy.

name: Creating a Birth Vision
description: Guided workshops and discussion threads on birth plans, choosing hospitals, and Black doulas.

name: Self-Love & Body Glow
description: Celebrating your evolving body through affirmations, fashion ideas, and confidence chats.

name: Work & Pregnancy Balance
description: Navigating work, maternity leave, and stress management for Black working moms.

name: Preparing the Nursery
description: Inspiration boards, DIY décor, and culturally affirming baby room ideas.

name: Second Trimester Support Boston
description: Meet Black expecting mothers in Boston’s Roxbury, Dorchester, and Jamaica Plain areas.

name: Birth Prep for Black Mamas
description: Learn about birth positions, hospital rights, and ways to center yourself during delivery.

name: Doula & Delivery Stories
description: Hear real experiences from Black doulas and moms as they prepare for labor.

name: Hospital Bag & Checklist Crew
description: Share and compare hospital bag must-haves, from bonnets to baby outfits.

name: Labor Affirmations & Visualization
description: Mindful affirmations and guided imagery to build confidence for labor day.

name: Third Trimester Wellness & Sleep
description: Tips for managing sleep, back pain, and swelling in the final weeks.

name: Birth Partner Coaching Space
description: For partners supporting Black birthing moms — what to expect and how to help.

name: Postpartum Ready
description: Conversations about recovery, breastfeeding, and emotional prep for the fourth trimester.

name: Black Birth Advocacy & Rights
description: Know your rights, request respectful care, and connect with Black maternal advocates.

name: Third Trimester Boston Moms
description: Local meetups and birthing resource shares for moms delivering soon in the Boston area.

name: Countdown to Birth Circle
description: Daily motivation and support as you prepare for your baby’s arrival.

name: Fourth Trimester Circle
description: A warm space for Black moms navigating the first 12 weeks after birth — share emotions, wins, and struggles.

name: Postpartum Mental Health & Healing
description: Weekly check-ins with Black therapists discussing baby blues, postpartum depression, and finding balance.

name: Breastfeeding & Body Journey
description: Tips, Q&As, and encouragement for breastfeeding, pumping, or bottle-feeding — no judgment zone.

name: Sleep & Newborn Care Chat
description: Share newborn care hacks, safe sleep routines, and night-shift survival tips.

name: Career Comeback Lounge
description: Support for Black moms returning to work — balancing identity, boundaries, and self-care.

name: Healing Our Bodies
description: Discussions about pelvic floor therapy, postpartum bleeding, and gentle movement recovery.

name: Partner & Co-Parent Check-Ins
description: Space for partners to share experiences supporting Black moms postpartum.

name: Postpartum Advocacy & Resources
description: Learn about postpartum coverage, local programs, and Black maternal advocacy orgs.

name: Boston Postpartum Moms
description: Boston-based meetups and baby-friendly events for postpartum moms of color.

name: Finding Your New Rhythm
description: Meditations, journaling prompts, and affirmations for grounding yourself in new motherhood.
